description: Schema for validating GCP function configurations (v1)

functions.description: List of functions to be deployed.

version.description: Version of the function configuration. Must be 1 for this schema.

source_folder.description: Path to the folder containing function code.

runtime.description: Runtime environment for the function, e.g., python38.

available_memory_mb.description: Available memory in MB for the function.

timeout.description: Execution timeout for the function in seconds.

entry_point.description: Entry point for the function (e.g., main function to execute).

trigger_http.description: If true, the function is triggered by an HTTP request.

labels.description: Labels for the function, defined as key-value pairs for metadata.

environment_variables.description: Environment variables for the function, defined as key-value pairs.

build_environment_variables.description: Build environment variables for the function, defined as key-value pairs.

vpc_connector.description: VPC connector to use, if applicable.

vpc_connector_egress_settings.description: Egress settings for the VPC connector, controlling outbound network traffic.

ingress_settings.description: Ingress settings to control traffic access to the function.

max_instances.description: Maximum number of instances allowed for the function.

min_instances.description: Minimum number of instances to keep warm for the function.

event_trigger.description: Event trigger configuration for the function. Used when the function is triggered by an event.

event_type.description: Type of event that triggers the function, e.g., 'google.storage.object.finalize'.

resource.description: Resource identifier for the event, such as a bucket name for storage events.

retry.description: If true, retries event processing upon failure.

secret_environment_variables.description: Secret environment variables for the function, defined as an array of secrets.

key.description: Name of the environment variable that holds the secret.

secret.description: Name of the secret resource to retrieve.

version.description: Version of the secret to use, e.g., 'latest'.
